about_the_game:
🎮 Gamer Stats Pro: Your Ultimate Companion for Player Statistics! 🎮

Are you passionate about diving into virtual worlds and experiencing epic adventures? Look no further than Gamer Stats Pro! This powerful tool allows you to track your gaming behavior on your PC **down to the minute** and take your gaming experiences to the next level.

What Can Gamer Stats Pro Do for You?

  • Game Tracking: Gamer Stats Pro automatically detects all games installed on your computer, whether through Steam or other means. From now on you will see exactly which game you played when and how much time you spent on it.
  • Visual Statistics: Immerse yourself in your gaming sessions with clear and appealing statistics. Find out which games are your top time-sinks, how many hours you've devoted to your favorite game, and which genres captivate you the most.
  • Year in Review: Say goodbye to flipping through calendars! With Gamer Stats Pro, you can generate a detailed year-in-review report. Which games accompanied you since the installation of Gamer Stats PRo? Discover it all!
  • Graphical Gamercard: Showcase your gaming passion to the world! Create your own Gamercard featuring key statistics, from total playtime to top games. Share it on social media, forums, or directly on Steam.

Why choose Gamer Stats Pro?

  • Live Tracking: Gamer Stats Pro tracks your gaming to generate detailed statistics - local on your PC. It also includes your Stream gaming stats, but the day-by-day statistics down-to-the-minute can only be generated with the gaming sessions tracked by Gamer Stats Pro.
  • 🚀 Simple and Intuitive: No complicated settings or lengthy configurations. Gamer Stats Pro is user-friendly and ready to go.
  • 📊 Detailed Insights: Understand your gaming behavior better and optimize your gaming sessions. Become a true gaming statistician and finally get to know yourself and your gaming habits!
  • 🌐 Cross-Platform: Gamer Stats Pro recognizes not only Steam games but also all titles installed on your PC. Get a comprehensive view of your gaming activities.

Get Gamer Stats Pro and explore your gaming world!

name: Gamer Stats Pro

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz AMD or Intel® processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz AMD or Intel® processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Gamer Stats Pro: Track all your 🎮 games locally on your PC, monitor your gameplay down to the minute, and dive into your 📊 gaming statistics! Rediscover your gaming world!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
